name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
title: Fleeting Iridescence: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
desc: "...Losing one's memory is no different from losing one's life. It is like death amidst darkness eternal."\n"Life is full of uncertainty. Love is fleeting, and even lasting memories may be lost..."
in_play_description:
When this character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
If the character has at least 2 Energy, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.

skills.desc:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
If the character has at least 2 Energy, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
